Text: RE TESTpst Lisa I received your email Bert Meyers Original Message From Gang Lisa Sent Wednesday March AM To DLUBSW Energy Real Portland Real Time Subject TEST This is a test I want to make sure this is the correct address for you guys Please respond and let me know Thank You Lisa gang

Imports for Mead Cc PST Craig and Bill Please note that for Wednesday Import ID ENRJCISO is wrong The Onpeak needs to be a mw and the offpeak needs to be a mw You will want to change the load zones in SP to make us flat in position manager Thanks Bert Meyers

FW DA ahead Cali schedule taken to the HA market PST Original Message From Meyers Albert Sent Tuesday January PM To Solberg Geir Williams III Bill Cc DLPortland Volume Mgmt Subject DA ahead Cali schedule taken to the HA market To whom it may concern For January the in order to pass phase II within the CISO market I agreed to take a schedule from the DA to the HA in NP with the APX The schedule is for mw on peak I built a load zone in PGE ST Cali and took the trade with the APX to zero Please be sure to reempliment the original schedule I spoke with Max the APX and the schedule was changed because the APX could not verify the schedule with their customer Sierra Pacific Holdings If you have any questions please give me a call Bert

DA ahead Cali schedule taken to the HA market Cc PST To whom it may concern For January the in order to pass phase II within the CISO market I agreed to take a schedule from the DA to the HA in NP with the APX The schedule is for mw on peak I built a load zone in PGE ST Cali and took the trade with the APX to zero Please be sure to reempliment the original schedule I spoke with Max the APX and the schedule was changed because the APX could not verify the schedule with their customer Sierra Pacific Holdings If you have any questions please give me a call Bert

INC SHEET AND INC SHEET POSITION MANAGER AND PL SHEETPST Ryan I made two styles of inc sheets for our future use One of them is an inc sheet position manager and profitloss sheet in oneplease note that the colors are a little busy and it may be simplified The other is broken out with the inc sheet similar to yours with a few additions and then the position manager and profitloss sheet on a different worksheet See what you can do to improve themObviously neither are fully integrated yet as I am a bit rusty on my excel skills Especially when it comes to macros If you want I can come in later today and we can work on them together Bert Meyers
JANUARY SCHEDULEPST GUYS PLEASE SEE THE NEW SCHEDULE FOR JANUARY PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE ie A CHANGE IN WHAT WE ARE ACTUALLY DOING EVERY DAY THANKS BERT MEYERS

Power Delivery for Sunday and Monday and Cc PST Roger From the information that I was able to gather regarding power delivery for Sunday and Monday December th and th it appears as though we were able to schedule and deliver mw around the clock for Sunday and mw offpeak and mw onpeak for Monday The Etags I referenced are as follows Tag mw around the clock Sunday and Monday Tag mw around the clock Sunday Tag mw OffPeak Monday If you have any question please contact myself John or Andrea Woodland Regards Bert Meyers

RE Current Cell Phone NumberPST Grace Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter Bert Original Message From Rodriguez Grace Sent Monday December PM To Meyers Albert Subject RE Current Cell Phone Number Hi Bert Per ATT you have been authorized to take over this cell phone number however there is a deposit or month pay history that needs to be provided Current balance is Please contact ATT directly to complete the process or You will need to provide them with billing information address phone SSN DOB etc If you have any problems please let me know Thanks Grace x Original Message From Meyers Albert Sent Monday December PM To Rodriguez Grace Subject Current Cell Phone Number Grace I was told by Kathryn ATT to inform you of my wishes to keep the current number and contract for my cell phoneof course once I give them a call If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Bert

Current Cell Phone NumberPST Grace I was told by Kathryn ATT to inform you of my wishes to keep the current number and contract for my cell phoneof course once I give them a call If you have any questions please feel free to call Thanks Bert

EPE for PST Bill Just wanted you to know that EPE lost one of the Turbines hour ending about or soI tried to buy power from everyone but to almost no avail exept mw integrated to a mw past the hourFurthermore I cut IID to a mw from a mw which integrated to a mw being as I kept the first whole For HE I was forced to cut one of a mw purchase from PNM to a mw because our imports were over capacity I also bought back mw from IID for HE Please see the note for more details or the model and ask me with any questions Bert

New Real Time Schedule for December PST Team Pleas note that there is a new schedule for December You may find it in the real time schedule notebook If you have any questions or concerns you may either trade with one another or talk to Bill for a remedy Thanks Bert
cnbcPST tickerarticleaspSymbolUSENEFeedRTRDateID

RE eHRBenefits Contact FormPST Mr Hewitt I was just wanting to know what my password is for the eHR website Regards Bert Meyers Original Message From Hewitt Gary MKT mailtoGary atsonWyattcom Sent Friday November AM To Meyers Albert Subject RE eHRBenefits Contact Form Mr Meyers I received your request from eHRcom this morning Please let me know what kinds of information you would like so I can best direct your request Thank you very much Gary Hewitt Web Content Manager Watson Wyatt Worldwide H Street NW Washington DC tel fax Original Message From Gary Hewitt mailto Sent Friday November AM To Gary Hewitt Generic eHR Request Subject eHRBenefits Contact Form Information Submitted from eHRcom contact form Gary Hewitt Generic eHR Request Name Albert Meyers Title Specialist Firm Enron North America Addr SW Salmon WTC City Portland State OR Zip email telephone wantcall on comment

real time cut tag PST TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN Tag number was cut for he on sunday The schedule was mw to the ciso mead sinking with MWD Calpine couldnt supply the energy so the schedule was cut to zero I made every attempt to resupply the power from NEVP which was willing to sell me the power for but Dawn the CISO would not let me resupply the schedule I thought this to be sort of wierd considering even WAPA was on board Please see me with any question Bert Meyers

REAL TIME CUT ON TAG PST TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN Tag number was cut for he on sunday The schedule was mw to the ciso mead sinking with MWD Calpine couldnt supply the energy so the schedule was cut to zero I made every attempt to resupply the power from NEVP which was willing to sell me the power for but Dawn the CISO would not let me resupply the schedule I thought this to be sort of wierd considering even WAPA was on board Please see me with any question Bert Meyers
REAL TIME SCHEDULEPST MIKE I MOVED ONE NIGHT ON THE SCHEDULE FOR NEXT MONTH PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF YOU HAVE A PROBLEM IT NETTED OUT TO YOU WORKING THE SAME NUMBER OF DAYS AND NIGHTS AS BEFORE BERT

Trader AssistantPST Amy Please note that I would like to interview for the trader assistant positions for both the cash desk and the term desk Bert Meyers Portland WSCC Real Time Desk
epe model for Cc PST Kathy Please find the enclosed epe model for Regards Bert Meyers

FW FW LaidOff A No Nothing ProductionPST Original Message From Molly Meyers mailto Sent Sunday January PM To Meyers Albert Subject Fwd FW LaidOff A No Nothing Production From Molly Meyers PTVcom To Subject FW LaidOff A No Nothing Production Date Fri Jan MIMEVersion Received from by hotmailcom with ESMTP id MHotMailBEFFDFCAA Fri Jan Received by SERVER with Internet Mail Service id DCNDPDCH Fri Jan From PTVcom Fri Jan MessageID DAECDAAAEDACFBCSERVER XMailer Internet Mail Service Original Message From Linda Huey Sent Friday January PM To Molly Meyers Subject FW LaidOff A No Nothing Production Original Message From Marco Coleman Sent Thursday January PM To Linda Huey Subject LaidOff A No Nothing Production indexhtml Chat with friends online try MSN Messenger
Buffalo GapPST Tom Buffalo Gap would be just fine Bert

Tuesday MorningPST Tom Earlier I wrote that it would be easier for me to meet downtown because I dont have my car However Molly has made an unexpected trip to PA so I have her car Meeting the Buffalo Gap is not a problem anymore Bert

EPE Schedules for Saturday PST Bill For yet another day we seem to be having problems including all the schedules in our EPE schedule sheet Tag was not included mw schedule to LADWP I think part of the problem is some counterparties are not including EPMIWE as a PSE Fortunately the dispatchers had the schedule and informed me of the problem I then called LADWP and WESCO to checkout with them If this did not happen we wouldnt have known what the deal was If you have any questions please give me a call Bert

Breakfast on TuesdayPST Tom If it is not too much trouble I would prefer to meet downtown I now live downtown and currently do not have a car If that is not possible its no big deal I will just take a cab over to the buffalo gap Just let me know Bert

RE How are you doing plus a little about mePST Tom I would be delighted to meet with you over breakfast I am available for both of the times you suggested just name the time and the place Regards Bert Original Message From Rosendahl Thomas G mailto Sent Thursday January PM To Meyers Albert Subject RE How are you doing plus a little about me Hi Bertmeister Good to have you back in the UBS fold It is also good to hear all is going well for you and Molly I would look forward to getting together sometime perhaps for breakfast next Tuesday or Wednesday or Let me know which works for you Tom Original Message From Meyers Albert mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Subject How are you doing plus a little about me Tom Just wanted to drop you a line to let you know that I am again an employee of UBS As I am sure you are aware we are in process of transition from Enron to UBS I recently filled out all the appropriate paperwork to complete the transition From what I understand we are going to be a part of the trading arm of UBS Warbug This should be very exciting Maybe one day I will have the opportunity to trade stocks bonds or some other financial product if power ever becomes old hat Furthermore I have will soon receive a signing bonus and a raise so I intend on funding my IRA and my wifes IRA for and maybe even If it wouldnt be too much trouble I would like to know what the contribution levels are for I think I saw something that changed them and the income levels one can have for a Roth As for Molly the advertising business seems to be picking up for She opened enough new business in the fourth quarter of to meet her goals and is on her way to making it the first quarter as well I think she is really beginning to understand her business Anyway I currently have lots of time to myself since we are not trading so maybe we can have lunch sometime If that is not possible no big deal I know that you are extremely busy I hope all is well with you and your family Sincerely Bert This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
ADS MachinePST Bill Last night as I was trying to log onto the ADS machine I kept getting a server error You will probably want to let one of the IT guys know of this problem Bert

How are you doing plus a little about mePST Tom Just wanted to drop you a line to let you know that I am again an employee of UBS As I am sure you are aware we are in process of transition from Enron to UBS I recently filled out all the appropriate paperwork to complete the transition From what I understand we are going to be a part of the trading arm of UBS Warbug This should be very exciting Maybe one day I will have the opportunity to trade stocks bonds or some other financial product if power ever becomes old hat Furthermore I have will soon receive a signing bonus and a raise so I intend on funding my IRA and my wifes IRA for and maybe even If it wouldnt be too much trouble I would like to know what the contribution levels are for I think I saw something that changed them and the income levels one can have for a Roth As for Molly the advertising business seems to be picking up for She opened enough new business in the fourth quarter of to meet her goals and is on her way to making it the first quarter as well I think she is really beginning to understand her business Anyway I currently have lots of time to myself since we are not trading so maybe we can have lunch sometime If that is not possible no big deal I know that you are extremely busy I hope all is well with you and your family Sincerely Bert

EPE Schedules for the past two daysPST Bill Please note the following due to the past two days schedules have been wrong in the EPE Schedules in Excel Tag number has been cancelled mw to the CISO Lending is wrong in the EPE schedules it is mw from PSCO instead of mw SPS is wrong for HE it is mw instead of mw I thought you might like to since this is the only income we have currently for realtime and a major screwup could hurt our relationship Regards Bert Meyers
